select t1.article_id as articleId, t2.username as articleAuthor, t1.article_title as articleTitle, t1.article_summary as articleSummary, t1.article_good_num as articleGoodNum, t1.article_image as articleImage, t1.create_time as createTime, t1.user_id as userId
from m_article t1 left join m_user t2 on t2.id=t1.user_id order by t1.create_time DESC
